description: League One leaders Birmingham City suffer their first league defeat in 19 games as they are well beaten at Bolton.
title: Bolton Wanderers 3-1 Birmingham City
title_page: Bolton Wanderers 3-1 Birmingham City - BBC Sport
maintext:
This will be Boltonâ€™s first home league game against Birmingham since August 2018, winning 1-0 in the Championship. The Trotters last defeated the Blues twice in a row at home in the league in May 2010 (run of 3 in the Premier League).
After their 2-0 win in October, Birmingham are looking to complete their first league double over Bolton since 2015-16.
Bolton have won each of their last three home league games, this after only winning one of their previous five beforehand (D1 L3).
